name: Abnormality
description:
Abnormality is an educational game designed for Psychology Majors. It has endless levels to test your skills on differential diagnosis. Make sure to give diagnosis before the time runs out.

For now, the game is still on its development phase.

This version is only available on Windows platform.

Disclaimer: Use the information of the game for educational purposes only. Do not use it to diagnose yourself or others. Psychological assessment requires a lot of information from different sources of data. Giving diagnosis with superficial information is both unethical and illegal.

Check out my other work using this link.
